```{r setup}
library(sbchannel)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
attach(fish)
fish <- sbc_fish[!(sbc_fish$SIZE < 0),] 
fish <- fish[which(fish$COMMON_NAME == "Painted Greenling"),]
head(fish)
```

```{r}
boxplot(SIZE~COMMON_NAME,
        data = fish, 
        main = "Boxplots of Different Painted Greenling Fish Size",
        xlab = "Painted Greenlings",
        ylab = "Size",
        col = "green",
        border = "darkgreen")
```
